original_title: Special traffic plan in Rajagiriya on Thursday
original_body_lines: The nominations for the upcoming Presidential Election will be accepted from 9.00 a.m. to 11.00 a.m. on August 15 at the Election Secretariat in Rajagiriya.
Accordingly, the police announced that a special traffic plan would be implemented from 8.00 a.m. to 2.00 p.m. on that day.
See below for the Police Media Division announcement on the traffic plan...
